dash Module¶

seawidgets.views.dash.dash(request, zone_code='socib', location_code='', template='dash.html')[source]¶

Default page for seaboard-seawidgets

Parameters:template – Add a custom template.
seawidgets.views.dash.index(request, location='pdp', template='index.html')[source]¶

Default page for seaboard-seawidgets

Parameters:template – Add a custom template.
seawidgets.views.dash.status(request)[source]¶

Check if server and database is ok. If its ok, the seaboard panel will refresh the page

seawidgets.views.dash.widget(request, name)[source]¶

Return widget template Only for development environment. In production, add the following line into virtualhost configuration: AliasMatch ^/views/(.*).html /var/www/seaboard/static/widgets/$1/$1.html

Parameters:template – Add a custom template.
